name: Billy_(South_Dakota)
text:
Billy (South Dakota)
For the Twin Peaks resident, see Billy (Twin Peaks).
Billy was a South Dakota Highway Patrol officer.
Biography
Billy and his partner arrived at the scene of a car accident near Buckhorn, where Dale Cooper's doppelganger had run off the road and vomited up a toxic substance. As he approached the driver's side door, Billy became sick to his stomach, doubling over and warning his partner to stay away. The other trooper radioed for backup and advised that they bring gas masks.
Subsequently, Billy was admitted to the hospital to be treated for his exposure to Cooper's vomit.
